title: if you have lost ranked rewards
body:
you should not be allowed to continue to play ranked in the 1st place

i feel like there should be a change to the behavior system

Players on chat restrictions should be prohibited from playing ranked games until thier restriction is over

players who recieve 14 day bans should be prohibited from playing ranked for 3 months when they become eligible for rewards again

replies.body:
I agree with the 14 day suspension one, not the chat restriction though.

You still have a point in being there if you are on a restriction, you dont if you were suspended.
